dcterms:description: A dataset related to COVID-19 comprising 4128 tweets for sentiment analysis task and 8661 tweets for fake news detection task.
dcterms:title: task1.c

dcterms:creator: S. Alhumoud
dcterms:description: A corpus of 416,292 annotated tweets about COVID-19 used for Arabic sentiment analysis.
dcterms:title: Corpus of 416,292 annotated tweets about COVID-19

dcterms:creator: M. Alhajji
A. Al Khalifah
M. Aljubran
M. Alkhalifah
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 53,127 tweets with hashtags related to public health measures imposed by the Saudi government during COVID-19.
dcterms:title: 53,127 tweets containing hashtags related to public health measures

dcterms:creator: A. R. Mahlous
A. Al-Laith
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 2500 manually labeled tweets and 34,529 automated labeled tweets from 7 million extracted tweets related to fake news detection during COVID-19.
dcterms:title: 2500 manually labeled tweets and 34,529 automated labeled tweets from 7 million extracted tweets

dcterms:creator: W. Shishah
dcterms:description: A collection of four datasets for fake news detection: Covid19Fakes, AraNews, Satirical News, and ANS.
dcterms:title: Covid19Fakes, AraNews, Satirical News, and ANS

dcterms:creator: A. B. Nassif
A. Elnagar
O. Elgendy
Y. Afadar
dcterms:description: Two Arabic fake news detection datasets related to COVID-19, one with 16,000 examples and another with 10,000 examples.
dcterms:title: Two Arabic FN detection datasets related to COVID-19
